participant_1.background:
I've spent many hours watching my lizard Gila basking in the sun.
My commute is the best part of my day, as I get to listen to my favorite music and think about my robotics projects.
i volunteer at animal shelters.
i like antiques.
I have been single for a while now and enjoy spending my time fishing and relaxing.

participant_2.background:
I'm a bit sad because my brother is leaving for the army.
i m the youngest of five.
my wife and i enjoy long sunday drives.
I live in my parent's basement and work a lot, so I usually don't have time for a healthy diet or exercise.
I have a dog named Snowball who keeps me company when I'm recovering from my knee surgery.

content.text: Good morning! How are you doing today?
Hey there! I'm doing okay, a little sad because my brother is leaving for the army today.
Oh no, I'm so sorry to hear that. I'm sure he will be safe and sound.
Thank you, I hope so too. He's the youngest of five kids, so he's always been the baby of the family.
I can imagine! I'm the youngest of four, so I know how that feels.
Yeah, it's going to be weird not having him around.
I'm sure he'll be back before you know it. In the meantime, what are you going to do to keep yourself busy?
Well, I'm going to be spending a lot of time with my wife and dog. We enjoy going on long Sunday drives together.
That sounds like a great way to spend your time. I love taking long drives, too.
Me too, it's a great way to relax and de-stress.
I'm glad you have some fun things to look forward to.
Yeah, me too. Thanks for listening.
Anytime! Let me know if there's anything I can do for you.
